  16. (* "Package" a set of .cmx/.o files into one .cmx/.o file having the
  17.    original compilation units as sub-modules. *)

  19. open Misc
  20. open Cmx_format

  22. ‌type error =
  23.     Illegal_renaming of string * string * string
  24.   | Forward_reference of string * string
  25.   | Wrong_for_pack of string * string
  26.   | Linking_error
  27.   | Assembler_error of string
  28.   | File_not_found of string


  31. exception Error of error

  33. (* Read the unit information from a .cmx file. *)

  35. ‌type pack_member_kind = PM_intf | PM_impl of unit_infos

  37. ‌type pack_member =
  38.   { pm_file: string;
  39.     pm_name: string;
  40.     pm_kind: pack_member_kind }

  42. ‌let read_member_info pack_path file = (
  43.   let name =
  44.     String.capitalize_ascii(Filename.basename(chop_extensions file)) in
  45.   let kind =
  46.     if Filename.check_suffix file ".cmi" then
  47.       PM_intf
  48.     else begin
  49.       let (info, crc) = Compilenv.read_unit_info file in
  50.       if info.ui_name <> name
  51.       then raise(Error(Illegal_renaming(name, file, info.ui_name)));
  52.       if info.ui_symbol <>
  53.          (Compilenv.current_unit_infos()).ui_symbol ^ "." ^ info.ui_name
  54.       then raise(Error(Wrong_for_pack(file, pack_path)));
  55.       Asmlink.check_consistency file info crc;
  56.       Compilenv.cache_unit_info info;
  57.       PM_impl info
  58.     end in
  59.   { pm_file = file; pm_name = name; pm_kind = kind }
  60. )

  62. (* Check absence of forward references *)

  64. ‌let check_units members =
  65.   let rec check forbidden = function
  66.     [] -> ()
  67.   | mb :: tl ->
  68.       begin match mb.pm_kind with
  69.       | PM_intf -> ()
  70.       | PM_impl infos ->
  71.           List.iter
  72.             (fun (unit, _) ->
  73.               if List.mem unit forbidden
  74.               then raise(Error(Forward_reference(mb.pm_file, unit))))
  75.             infos.ui_imports_cmx
  76.       end;
  77.       check (list_remove mb.pm_name forbidden) tl in
  78.   check (List.map (fun mb -> mb.pm_name) members) members

  80. (* Make the .o file for the package *)

  82. let make_package_object ~ppf_dump members targetobj targetname coercion
  83.       ~backend =
  84.   Profile.record_call (Printf.sprintf "pack(%s)" targetname) (fun () ->
  85.     let objtemp =
  86.       if !Clflags.keep_asm_file
  87.       then Filename.remove_extension targetobj ^ ".pack" ^ Config.ext_obj
  88.       else
  89.         (* Put the full name of the module in the temporary file name
  90.            to avoid collisions with MSVC's link /lib in case of successive
  91.            packs *)
  92.         Filename.temp_file (Compilenv.make_symbol (Some "")) Config.ext_obj in
  93. ‌    let components =
  94.       List.map
  95.         (fun m ->
  96.           match m.pm_kind with
  97.           | PM_intf -> None
  98.           | PM_impl _ -> Some(Ident.create_persistent m.pm_name))
  99.         members in
  100. ‌    let module_ident = Ident.create_persistent targetname in
  101. ‌    let prefixname = Filename.remove_extension objtemp in
  102. ‌    let required_globals = Ident.Set.empty in
  103. ‌    let program, middle_end =
  104.       if Config.flambda then
  105.         let main_module_block_size, code =
  106.           Translmod.transl_package_flambda components coercion
  107.         in
  108.         let code = Simplif.simplify_lambda code in
  109.         let program =
  110.           { Lambda.
  111.             code;
  112.             main_module_block_size;
  113.             module_ident;
  114.             required_globals;
  115.           }
  116.         in
  117.         program, Flambda_middle_end.lambda_to_clambda
  118.       else
  119.         let main_module_block_size, code =
  120.           Translmod.transl_store_package components
  121.             (Ident.create_persistent targetname) coercion
  122.         in
  123.         let code = Simplif.simplify_lambda code in
  124.         let program =
  125.           { Lambda.
  126.             code;
  127.             main_module_block_size;
  128.             module_ident;
  129.             required_globals;
  130.           }
  131.         in
  132.         program, Closure_middle_end.lambda_to_clambda
  133.     in
  134.     Asmgen.compile_implementation ~backend
  135.       ~prefixname
  136.       ~middle_end
  137.       ~ppf_dump
  138.       program;
  139. ‌    let objfiles =
  140.       List.map
  141.         (fun m -> Filename.remove_extension m.pm_file ^ Config.ext_obj)
  142.         (List.filter (fun m -> m.pm_kind <> PM_intf) members) in
  143. ‌    let exitcode =
  144.       Ccomp.call_linker Ccomp.Partial targetobj (objtemp :: objfiles) ""
  145.     in
  146.     remove_file objtemp;
  147.     if not (exitcode = 0) then raise(Error Linking_error)
  148.   )

  150. (* Make the .cmx file for the package *)

  152. ‌let get_export_info ui =
  153.   assert(Config.flambda);
  154.   match ui.ui_export_info with
  155.   | Clambda _ -> assert false
  156.   | Flambda info -> info

  158. ‌let get_approx ui =
  159.   assert(not Config.flambda);
  160.   match ui.ui_export_info with
  161.   | Flambda _ -> assert false
  162.   | Clambda info -> info

  164. ‌let build_package_cmx members cmxfile =
  165.   let unit_names =
  166.     List.map (fun m -> m.pm_name) members in
  167.   let filter lst =
  168.     List.filter (fun (name, _crc) -> not (List.mem name unit_names)) lst in
  169.   let union lst =
  170.     List.fold_left
  171.       (List.fold_left
  172.           (fun accu n -> if List.mem n accu then accu else n :: accu))
  173.       [] lst in
  174.   let units =
  175.     List.fold_right
  176.       (fun m accu ->
  177.         match m.pm_kind with PM_intf -> accu | PM_impl info -> info :: accu)
  178.       members [] in
  179.   let pack_units =
  180.     List.fold_left
  181.       (fun set info ->
  182.          let unit_id = Compilenv.unit_id_from_name info.ui_name in
  183.          Compilation_unit.Set.add
  184.            (Compilenv.unit_for_global unit_id) set)
  185.       Compilation_unit.Set.empty units in
  186.   let units =
  187.     if Config.flambda then
  188.       List.map (fun info ->
  189.           { info with
  190.             ui_export_info =
  191.               Flambda
  192.                 (Export_info_for_pack.import_for_pack ~pack_units
  193.                    ~pack:(Compilenv.current_unit ())
  194.                    (get_export_info info)) })
  195.         units
  196.     else
  197.       units
  198.   in
  199. ‌  let ui = Compilenv.current_unit_infos() in
  200. ‌  let ui_export_info =
  201.     if Config.flambda then
  202.       let ui_export_info =
  203.         List.fold_left (fun acc info ->
  204.             Export_info.merge acc (get_export_info info))
  205.           (Export_info_for_pack.import_for_pack ~pack_units
  206.              ~pack:(Compilenv.current_unit ())
  207.              (get_export_info ui))
  208.           units
  209.       in
  210.       Flambda ui_export_info
  211.     else
  212.       Clambda (get_approx ui)
  213.   in
  214.   Export_info_for_pack.clear_import_state ();
  215. ‌  let pkg_infos =
  216.     { ui_name = ui.ui_name;
  217.       ui_symbol = ui.ui_symbol;
  218.       ui_defines =
  219.           List.flatten (List.map (fun info -> info.ui_defines) units) @
  220.           [ui.ui_symbol];
  221.       ui_imports_cmi =
  222.           (ui.ui_name, Some (Env.crc_of_unit ui.ui_name)) ::
  223.           filter(Asmlink.extract_crc_interfaces());
  224.       ui_imports_cmx =
  225.           filter(Asmlink.extract_crc_implementations());
  226.       ui_curry_fun =
  227.           union(List.map (fun info -> info.ui_curry_fun) units);
  228.       ui_apply_fun =
  229.           union(List.map (fun info -> info.ui_apply_fun) units);
  230.       ui_send_fun =
  231.           union(List.map (fun info -> info.ui_send_fun) units);
  232.       ui_force_link =
  233.           List.exists (fun info -> info.ui_force_link) units;
  234.       ui_export_info;
  235.       ui_for_pack = None;
  236.     } in
  237.   Compilenv.write_unit_info pkg_infos cmxfile

  239. (* Make the .cmx and the .o for the package *)

  241. ‌let package_object_files ~ppf_dump files targetcmx
  242.                          targetobj targetname coercion ~backend =
  243.   let pack_path =
  244.     match !Clflags.for_package with
  245.     | None -> targetname
  246.     | Some p -> p ^ "." ^ targetname in
  247.   let members = map_left_right (read_member_info pack_path) files in
  248.   check_units members;
  249.   make_package_object ~ppf_dump members targetobj targetname coercion ~backend;
  250.   build_package_cmx members targetcmx

  252. (* The entry point *)

  254. ‌let package_files ~ppf_dump initial_env files targetcmx ~backend =
  255.   let files =
  256.     List.map
  257.       (fun f ->
  258.         try Load_path.find f
  259.         with Not_found -> raise(Error(File_not_found f)))
  260.       files in
  261.   let prefix = chop_extensions targetcmx in
  262.   let targetcmi = prefix ^ ".cmi" in
  263.   let targetobj = Filename.remove_extension targetcmx ^ Config.ext_obj in
  264.   let targetname = String.capitalize_ascii(Filename.basename prefix) in
  265.   (* Set the name of the current "input" *)
  266.   Location.input_name := targetcmx;
  267.   (* Set the name of the current compunit *)
  268.   Compilenv.reset ?packname:!Clflags.for_package targetname;
  269.   Misc.try_finally (fun () ->
  270.       let coercion =
  271.         Typemod.package_units initial_env files targetcmi targetname in
  272.       package_object_files ~ppf_dump files targetcmx targetobj targetname
  273.         coercion ~backend
  274.     )
  275.     ~exceptionally:(fun () -> remove_file targetcmx; remove_file targetobj)

  277. (* Error report *)

  279. open Format

  281. let report_error ppf = function
  282.     Illegal_renaming(name, file, id) ->
  283.       fprintf ppf "Wrong file naming: %a@ contains the code for\
  284.                    @ %s when %s was expected"
  285.         Location.print_filename file name id
  286.   | Forward_reference(file, ident) ->
  287.       fprintf ppf "Forward reference to %s in file %a" ident
  288.         Location.print_filename file
  289.   | Wrong_for_pack(file, path) ->
  290.       fprintf ppf "File %a@ was not compiled with the `-for-pack %s' option"
  291.               Location.print_filename file path
  292.   | File_not_found file ->
  293.       fprintf ppf "File %s not found" file
  294.   | Assembler_error file ->
  295.       fprintf ppf "Error while assembling %s" file
  296.   | Linking_error ->
  297.       fprintf ppf "Error during partial linking"

  299. let () =
  300.   Location.register_error_of_exn
  301.     (function
  302.       | Error err -> Some (Location.error_of_printer_file report_error err)
  303.       | _ -> None
  304.     )
